title: How to Turn on or off the Built‚ÄêIn Ad blocker Opera Browser

steps.title: Launch Opera Browser on your PC.
steps.content: Launch Opera Browser on your PC. This app's icon looks like a red coloured O with a transparent background. Remember that Ad blocker is only available on the latest version of Opera browser. If you don't have Opera on your system, download for free from www.opera.com

steps.title: Open the Easy setup from the home page.
steps.content: Open the Easy setup from the home page. You can see the Easy setup's icon on the top-right side of the window. When you click on it, a side-menu tab will appear there.

steps.title: Scroll down to Features section.
steps.content: Scroll down to Features section. Toggle on the grey switch, right across the Block ads . When you turn on Ad blocker, the grey switch will turn to blue. If you want to turn off the Ad blocker, just toggle off the blue switch.

steps.title: Finished.
steps.content: Finished. If you want to see the Ad blocker stats, click on the blue shield icon at the address bar. Done!

steps.title: Open Opera browser.
steps.content: Open Opera browser. If you can't find Opera, use the search bar from the Windows start menu. Make sure that you are using the latest version of Opera.

steps.title: Go to the Settings.
steps.content: Go to the Settings. Click on Opera's icon at the top-right corner of the window and select Settings from the drop-down list. Alternatively, you can press Alt + P on your keyboard to open the settings page.

steps.title: Navigate to Block ads.
steps.content: Navigate to Block ads . Check the Block ads and surf the web up to three times faster checkbox to turn on the Ad blocker. If you want to disable the Ad blocker on Opera, just uncheck the box.

steps.title: Done.
steps.content: Done. If your Ad blocker is active, you will see a blue shield icon at the address bar. Just click on it to see the Ad blocker stats. Finished!
